ComicInfo.Summary: Bitter Conclusion: In the past story line, a year before the party at Nica's, Arthur and Maia escape a raid. Disquieted by her meeting with Nica, Maia tries to convince Arthur to quit, but a huge explosion kills Jas and injures them. They flee, blowing up a truck as a diversion. Presently, Nica convinces Babb to suppress the entire story, but secretly, he tells his editor to proceed. He is moved to where Fran has already been detained and beaten. There, after attempting to destroy the journal in Fran's bag, he's thwarted and imprisoned. Finally he learns that the journal finally has been published.
ComicInfo.Title: Bitter Conclusion
ComicInfo.Characters: Kay,Maia Reveron,Arthur McBride,Croger Babb,Jas (corpse),Archi,Almicar Gio, Christoph,Luis,Fran Woronov,George Penny (corpse),Nica,Ed Lybant
